com.google.gdata.devtools.eclipse
Class ProjectCreator

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gdata.devtools.eclipse.ProjectCreator

public class ProjectCreator
extends java.lang.Object

This class creates a Java Project in the workspace along with the referenced libraries required for a particular template. It also generates the template and adds it to the created project.

Constructor Summary
ProjectCreator(java.lang.String projectName, FileTemplateConfig templateConfig)
          Creates a new ProjectCreator instance given the project name and a template configuration.

          Creates a new template from the templateContent, adds it to the project created in the workspace and returns it.

Constructor Detail

ProjectCreator

public ProjectCreator(java.lang.String projectName,
                      FileTemplateConfig templateConfig)
Creates a new ProjectCreator instance given the project name and a template configuration.

Parameters:
projectName - the name of the project to be created
templateConfig - the template configuration of the template to be added
Method Detail

generate

public java.lang.String generate(org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor,
                                 java.util.Vector<org.eclipse.jdt.core.IClasspathEntry> dependencyClasspaths,
                                 java.lang.String errorMessage)
                          throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
Creates a new project in the workspace and returns the data to be inserted into the template file.

The dependency classpaths are added as referenced libraries to the project. The error message is the message generated if any of the required library is not found.

Parameters:
monitor - the progress monitor
dependencyClasspaths - the dependency class paths to be referenced
errorMessage - the error message to be added to the template
Returns:
The generated template data
Throws:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - if anything goes wrong

addTemplateToProject

public org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile addTemplateToProject(java.lang.String destinationContainer,
                                                             java.lang.String templateContent,
                                                             org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor,
                                                             int noOfTicks)
                                                      throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
Creates a new template from the templateContent, adds it to the project created in the workspace and returns it.

The generated template is added to the destinationContainer in the project created in the workspace.

Parameters:
destinationContainer - the relative container path in the project created
templateContent - the content of the template to be added
monitor - the progress monitor
noOfTicks - the number of ticks allocated to the monitor
Returns:
the generated template file
Throws:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - if anything goes wrong.

openFile

public void openFile(org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile file,
                     org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell shell,
                     org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor,
                     int noOfTicks)
Opens the template file which is added to the project for editing.

Parameters:
file - the template file to be opened
shell - the shell to open the generated template
monitor - the progress monitor
noOfTicks - the number of ticks allocated to the monitor
